ypes with

des Status, Content-Type, and one or the other of Content-Length or
'Transf=
er-Coding: chunked'.

Gopher also supports self-descriptive messaging by us=
ing media type
identifiers.  This holds true for *any* protocol that has a =
concept of
resource vs. representation.  If the server doesn't specify a
pr=
ocessing model, the entity is *meaningless* no matter how much other
contro=
l data is present, unless clients and intermediaries resort to
introspectio=
n -- which clearly violates REST.

aspect of RESTful self-descriptive messaging, re=
